sentence.Network_en: These are the customs of forefather hand down to us.

sentence.Network_en: Like his forefather, Benny had the ability to foresee the future.
sentence.Network_cn: 像他的祖先一样, 本尼有能力预知将来.

sentence.Network_en: My forefather came to the USA 200 years ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的祖先在两百年前来到美国.

entry.def: Your forefathers are your ancestors, especially your male ancestors.

example.ex: They were determined to go back to the land of their forefathers.
example.tran: 他们决意回到祖先的土地上。

means.word_mean: 2. person from an earlier time who contributed to the tradition shared by some group;

sentences.sentence: "our forefathers brought forth a great nation"

auth_sentence.content: Unlike their L.A. gangsta rap forefather Ice-T, N.

auth_sentence.content: But Patagonia's forefather isn't quite done with Patagonia yet.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Patagonia's forefather isn't quite done with Patagonia yet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Patagonia's forefather isn't quite done with Patagonia yet.

auth_sentence.content: "Form ever follows function," said Louis Sullivan, the visionary Chicago architect who was a forefather of the Bauhaus.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Form ever follows function," said Louis Sullivan, the visionary Chicago architect who was a forefather of the Bauhaus.

sentences.en: He went to visit the graves of his forefathers.
sentences.cn: 他去拜谒他祖先的墓地。

sentences.en: They are the most precious cultural legacy our forefathers left.
sentences.cn: 它们是我们祖先留下来的最宝贵的文化遗产。

sentences.en: All of us bristled at the lawyer’s speech insulting our forefathers.
sentences.cn: 听到那个律师在讲演中污蔑我们的祖先,大家都气得怒发冲冠。
